Workstealing algorithm

Classes that defines both local and distributed workstealing. More...

Classes

class  WS::Community
 Community of distribued PoolsThe community is a dynamic group of process. The Community object is responsible to implement the distributed workstealing using active message of the network. The object is responsible to implement default method for Callback and Upcall method in order to defined the behaviors in case of errors. The Community is an Object (from Net::Group and Core::WorkSet inheritences) with an identifier generated by the Net::Group object. More...
